SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.managers

Class CollisionManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.managers.CollisionManager
public class CollisionManager extends Object
CollisionManager detects and handles collisions between game objects, updating the game state and triggering effects as necessary.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    private static class 
    CollisionManager.CollisionResult
    Represents the result of a collision between two game objects.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollisionManager

      public CollisionManager(javafx.scene.Group root, Runnable updateHitCount, Runnable updateKillCount, EffectManager effectManager, AudioManager AudioManager)
      Constructs a CollisionManager with the necessary dependencies.
      Parameters:
      root - the root group for managing game objects.
      updateHitCount - the callback to update the hit count.
      updateKillCount - the callback to update the kill count.
      effectManager - the manager for visual effects.
      AudioManager - the manager for audio effects.

  • Method Details

    • handleAllCollisions

      public void handleAllCollisions(List<ActiveActorDestructible> friendlyUnits, List<ActiveActorDestructible> enemyUnits, List<ActiveActorDestructible> friendlyProjectiles, List<ActiveActorDestructible> enemyProjectiles)
      Handles all collisions between game objects, triggering effects and updates.
      Parameters:
      friendlyUnits - list of friendly units.
      enemyUnits - list of enemy units.
      friendlyProjectiles - list of projectiles fired by friendly units.
      enemyProjectiles - list of projectiles fired by enemy units.

    • handleEnemyProjectileCollisions

      private void handleEnemyProjectileCollisions()
      Handles collisions between enemy projectiles and friendly units.

    • handleFriendlyProjectileCollisions

      private void handleFriendlyProjectileCollisions()
      Handles collisions between friendly projectiles and enemy units.

    • handlePlaneCollisions

      private void handlePlaneCollisions()
      Handles collisions between enemy and friendly planes.

    • handleEnemyPenetration

      private void handleEnemyPenetration()
      Handles cases where enemies penetrate friendly defenses.

    • enemyHasPenetratedDefenses

      private boolean enemyHasPenetratedDefenses(ActiveActorDestructible enemy)
      Checks if an enemy has penetrated the friendly defenses.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy to check.
      Returns:
      true if the enemy has penetrated defenses, false otherwise.

    • detectCollisions

      private List<CollisionManager.CollisionResult> detectCollisions(List<ActiveActorDestructible> projectiles, List<ActiveActorDestructible> targets)
      Detects collisions between projectiles and targets.
      Parameters:
      projectiles - list of projectiles.
      targets - list of potential targets.
      Returns:
      a list of collision results.
